amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit an individual who is prohibited from possessing a firearm by the Gun Control Act from using a public target range.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House Report 114-429 to prohibit an individual who is prohibited from possessing a firearm by the Gun Control Act from using a public target range.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 244 (Roll no. 92).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 244 (Roll no. 92).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Beyer.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
